verses.text: Ach in Diosal, ul colineli. Mamin Jehová, cotanh elanhchamel yic tzin a colani.
A eb' snib'an in smilanchamoc, q'uixvocab' el eb', somchajocab' el eb'. A eb' sgana yak'an chucal d'ayin, b'atocab' eb' elelal yuj q'uixvelal.
A eb' tzin b'uchani, aton eb' tz'el stzub' d'ayin, b'atocab' eb' elelal yuj q'uixvelal.
Axo masanil eb' syaq'uem sb'a d'ayach, tzalajocab' sk'ol eb'. A eb' snib'an a colval, yalocab' eb' to te nivan elk'ochi.
A in pax tic jun, ilb'aj in k'ool, cusk'olal vaji. Axo svalani: Ach in Diosal, cotanh d'a elanhchamel yic tzin a colani. A achnhej tzin a coltaxoni. Cotanh d'a elanhchamel, Mamin Jehová, xin chi.
